speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: SCENE V. A room in the Garter Inn.

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: Enter FALSTAFF and BARDOLPH

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Bardolph, I say,--

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Here, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Go fetch me a quart of sack; put a toast in't.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Exit BARDOLPH

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Have I lived to be carried in a basket, like a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: barrow of butcher's offal, and to be thrown in the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Thames? Well, if I be served such another trick,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: I'll have my brains ta'en out and buttered, and give

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: them to a dog for a new-year's gift. The rogues

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: slighted me into the river with as little remorse as

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: they would have drowned a blind bitch's puppies,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: fifteen i' the litter: and you may know by my size

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: that I have a kind of alacrity in sinking; if the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: bottom were as deep as hell, I should down. I had

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: been drowned, but that the shore was shelvy and

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: shallow,--a death that I abhor; for the water swells

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: a man; and what a thing should I have been when I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: had been swelled! I should have been a mountain of mummy.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Re-enter BARDOLPH with sack

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Here's Mistress Quickly, sir, to speak with you.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Let me pour in some sack to the Thames water; for my

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: belly's as cold as if I had swallowed snowballs for

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: pills to cool the reins. Call her in.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Come in, woman!

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: By your leave; I cry you mercy: give your worship

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: good morrow.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Take away these chalices. Go brew me a pottle of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: sack finely.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: With eggs, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Simple of itself; I'll no pullet-sperm in my brewage.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Exit BARDOLPH

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: How now!

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: Marry, sir, I come to your worship from Mistress Ford.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Mistress Ford! I have had ford enough; I was thrown

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: into the ford; I have my belly full of ford.

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: Alas the day! good heart, that was not her fault:

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: she does so take on with her men; they mistook their erection.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: So did I mine, to build upon a foolish woman's promise.

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: Well, she laments, sir, for it, that it would yearn

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: your heart to see it. Her husband goes this morning

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: a-birding; she desires you once more to come to her

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: between eight and nine: I must carry her word

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: quickly: she'll make you amends, I warrant you.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Well, I will visit her: tell her so; and bid her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: think what a man is: let her consider his frailty,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: and then judge of my merit.

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: I will tell her.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Do so. Between nine and ten, sayest thou?

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: Eight and nine, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Well, be gone: I will not miss her.

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: Peace be with you, sir.

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: Exit

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: I marvel I hear not of Master Brook; he sent me word

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: to stay within: I like his money well. O, here he comes.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Enter FORD

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Bless you, sir!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Now, master Brook, you come to know what hath passed

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: between me and Ford's wife?

speaker: FORD
text_entry: That, indeed, Sir John, is my business.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Master Brook, I will not lie to you: I was at her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: house the hour she appointed me.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: And sped you, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Very ill-favoredly, Master Brook.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: How so, sir? Did she change her determination?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: No, Master Brook; but the peaking Cornuto her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: husband, Master Brook, dwelling in a continual

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: 'larum of jealousy, comes me in the instant of our

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: encounter, after we had embraced, kissed, protested,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: and, as it were, spoke the prologue of our comedy;

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: and at his heels a rabble of his companions, thither

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: provoked and instigated by his distemper, and,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: forsooth, to search his house for his wife's love.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: What, while you were there?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: While I was there.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: And did he search for you, and could not find you?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: You shall hear. As good luck would have it, comes

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: in one Mistress Page; gives intelligence of Ford's

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: approach; and, in her invention and Ford's wife's

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: distraction, they conveyed me into a buck-basket.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: A buck-basket!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: By the Lord, a buck-basket! rammed me in with foul

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: shirts and smocks, socks, foul stockings, greasy

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: napkins; that, Master Brook, there was the rankest

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: compound of villanous smell that ever offended nostril.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: And how long lay you there?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Nay, you shall hear, Master Brook, what I have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: suffered to bring this woman to evil for your good.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Being thus crammed in the basket, a couple of Ford's

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: knaves, his hinds, were called forth by their

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: mistress to carry me in the name of foul clothes to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Datchet-lane: they took me on their shoulders; met

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: the jealous knave their master in the door, who

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: asked them once or twice what they had in their

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: basket: I quaked for fear, lest the lunatic knave

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: would have searched it; but fate, ordaining he

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: should be a cuckold, held his hand. Well: on went he

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: for a search, and away went I for foul clothes. But

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: mark the sequel, Master Brook: I suffered the pangs

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: of three several deaths; first, an intolerable

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: fright, to be detected with a jealous rotten

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: bell-wether; next, to be compassed, like a good

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: bilbo, in the circumference of a peck, hilt to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: point, heel to head; and then, to be stopped in,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: like a strong distillation, with stinking clothes

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: that fretted in their own grease: think of that,--a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: man of my kidney,--think of that,--that am as subject

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: to heat as butter; a man of continual dissolution

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: and thaw: it was a miracle to scape suffocation.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: And in the height of this bath, when I was more than

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: half stewed in grease, like a Dutch dish, to be

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: thrown into the Thames, and cooled, glowing hot,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: in that surge, like a horse-shoe; think of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: that,--hissing hot,--think of that, Master Brook.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: In good sadness, I am sorry that for my sake you

speaker: FORD
text_entry: have sufferd all this. My suit then is desperate;

speaker: FORD
text_entry: you'll undertake her no more?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Master Brook, I will be thrown into Etna, as I have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: been into Thames, ere I will leave her thus. Her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: husband is this morning gone a-birding: I have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: received from her another embassy of meeting; 'twixt

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: eight and nine is the hour, Master Brook.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: 'Tis past eight already, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Is it? I will then address me to my appointment.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Come to me at your convenient leisure, and you shall

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: know how I speed; and the conclusion shall be

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: crowned with your enjoying her. Adieu. You shall

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: have her, Master Brook; Master Brook, you shall

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: cuckold Ford.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Exit

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Hum! ha! is this a vision? is this a dream? do I

speaker: FORD
text_entry: sleep? Master Ford awake! awake, Master Ford!

speaker: FORD
text_entry: there's a hole made in your best coat, Master Ford.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: This 'tis to be married! this 'tis to have linen

speaker: FORD
text_entry: and buck-baskets! Well, I will proclaim myself

speaker: FORD
text_entry: what I am: I will now take the lecher; he is at my

speaker: FORD
text_entry: house; he cannot 'scape me; 'tis impossible he

speaker: FORD
text_entry: should; he cannot creep into a halfpenny purse,

speaker: FORD
text_entry: nor into a pepper-box: but, lest the devil that

speaker: FORD
text_entry: guides him should aid him, I will search

speaker: FORD
text_entry: impossible places. Though what I am I cannot avoid,

speaker: FORD
text_entry: yet to be what I would not shall not make me tame:

speaker: FORD
text_entry: if I have horns to make one mad, let the proverb go

speaker: FORD
text_entry: with me: I'll be horn-mad.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Exit
